events.name: CartItemAdded
events.description: Captures the event of adding an item to the shopping cart.

events.name: CartItemRemoved
events.description: Captures the event of removing an item from the shopping cart.

events.name: CartDiscountApplied
events.description: Tracks discounts applied to the cart.

events.name: CartPromotionActivated
events.description: Handles the application of promotional offers to the cart.

commands.name: AddItem
commands.description: Captures the event of adding an item to the shopping cart.

commands.name: RemoveItem
commands.description: Captures the event of removing an item from the shopping cart.

commands.name: ApplyDiscount
commands.description: Tracks discounts applied to the cart.

commands.name: ActivatePromotion
commands.description: Handles the application of promotional offers to the cart.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with user management for user-specific cart data.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration to check inventory levels before confirming the cart.
